issue.title: Thread pitch definition is unclear (convert gazebo from rad/m to m/revolution)

content.raw:
Note: Different definitions of thread pitch in Gazebo and DART

* Gazebo: [negative](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/713a2391f47859f9e6fd66ed9fb700c3a914c670) angular motion per linear motion or rad / m in metric. (pitch = -ang / lin)
* DART: linear motion per one complete rotation or m / rad in metric. (pitch = lin / ang * 2pi)
content.html:
Note: Different definitions of thread pitch in Gazebo and DART

  • Gazebo: negative angular motion per linear motion or rad / m in metric. (pitch = -ang / lin)
  • DART: linear motion per one complete rotation or m / rad in metric. (pitch = lin / ang * 2pi)
